home.welcomeText: Here you can start a new adventure or continue your progress from a specific saga.

1.title: East Blue Saga
1.description: The saga where it all begins — we meet Luffy and his dream of becoming Pirate King.

2.title: Alabasta Saga
2.description: The crew arrives at the Alabasta desert to fight Crocodile and save the kingdom.

3.title: Sky Island Saga
3.description: An adventure in the sky where pirates seek legendary treasures and face Enel.

4.title: Water 7 Saga
4.description: The crew arrives at Water Seven, where crucial events happen for their future.

5.title: Thriller Bark Saga
5.description: A mysterious island where the crew fights zombies and Gecko Moria.

6.title: Marineford War Saga
6.description: The greatest war in the world of One Piece, deciding Ace and Luffy's fate.

7.title: Fishman Island Saga
7.description: After two years, the crew returns to continue their journey in the New World.

8.title: Dressrosa Saga
8.description: A long and dangerous saga where the crew faces Doflamingo.

9.title: Whole Cake Island Saga
9.description: The crew tries to save Sanji from Big Mom’s family — one of the Four Emperors.

10.title: Wano Kuni Saga
10.description: The samurai saga and alliance against Kaido — the world's balance is at stake.
